law.catch_line: Cooperative companies may adopt KRS 272.020 to 272.044 -- Filing fee.
law.text: Any cooperative company may become subject to the provisions of KRS 272.020 to 272.044 by filing with the Secretary of State a declaration signed and sworn to by the president and secretary that the company, by a majority vote of its stockholders or members, has decided to adopt KRS 272.020 to 272.044. There shall be paid to the Secretary of State a fee of two dollars ($2) for filing the declaration.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 136, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 14. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 883d-8.
